experience.title: Junior Software Implementor
experience.description: As a Junior Software Implementer at Translution Software since March 2024, I have developed T-SQL stored procedures for efficient data manipulation and created SSRS dashboards to enhance data visualization, providing valuable insights for clients. My role involves delivering exceptional customer support, ensuring timely issue resolution, and maintaining implemented projects to align with client requirements. Notably, I successfully implemented Warehouse Management Software that significantly improved inventory tracking and management.
experience.description2: Previously, as a Graduate Intern from September 2023 to February 2024, I gained proficiency in MSSQL for database management and conducted business analysis to identify opportunities for system improvements. I also enhanced the company email system to facilitate simultaneous emailing to multiple accounts. Additionally, my Capstone Project involved implementing Warehouse Management Software in the office storeroom to track and manage inventory, mirroring client implementations.
experience.technologies: MSSQL, SSMS, T-SQL, SQL, Stored Procedures, Views, SSRS Dashboards, Power BI, SYSPRO [ERP], Warehouse Inventory Management, Bartender Label Printing and a bit of Visual Basics

experience.title: Work Readiness Program
experience.description: I have gained proficiency in full-stack web development, equipping myself with the skills necessary to build dynamic and responsive web applications. Through my commitment to continuous learning, I acquired Agile rapid skills acquisition techniques, enabling me to adapt quickly to new technologies and methodologies.
experience.description2: I successfully completed a 4IR Technologies Bootcamp, where I focused on cutting-edge topics such as Machine Learning and Blockchain, enhancing my understanding of these transformative technologies. Additionally, my studies in Engineering Business Systems have provided me with valuable insights into improving system design and implementation, ensuring that solutions are both efficient and effective.
experience.technologies: JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, ReactJS, AlpineJS, Html, CSS, Bootstrap, Python, Machine learning algorithms, Agile Methodologies, Git and Github

experience.title: Mathematics Assistant
experience.description: In my role as a Mathematics Assistant at Mmametlhake Secondary School, I provided targeted support to high school students in mathematics, enhancing their understanding and performance in the subject. I worked closely with students to clarify complex concepts, develop problem-solving skills, and boost their confidence in mathematical abilities. Through personalized guidance and collaborative learning techniques, I fostered an engaging learning environment that encouraged academic growth and improved overall performance in mathematics.

technical.skill: ETL Process | Data Pipelines | Data Cleaning
Data Visualization | Power BI | SSRS Dashboards

projects.title: Pizza Cart Using API
projects.description: In this projest, I have used an API to build a Pizza application where users have to login using a username before they are allowed to start buying pizzas. The user can customise the platform by adding 3 featured pizzas from the provided list furthermore a user is able to view their old carts, and also sign out
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript, AlpineJS, Bootstrap, Postman, Rest client, Git and Github

projects.title: Widgets for Bootcamp functions
projects.description: Developed widgets for 4 of the bootcamp funtions we did earlier in the program. in this project a user interacts with the Javascript functions though the UI with the help of AlpineJS.
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript,AlpineJS, Bootstrap, Git and Github

projects.title: Pizza Cart
projects.description: Develpoed a Pizza Cart which a user can use to place an order, view the order in the cart and checkout. In this projects i was using Alpine JS to manipulate the HTML elements on the screen.

projects.title: Counter Using AlpineJS framework
projects.description: Developed a counter that increments and decrements using Alpine JS framework to manipulate the HTML elements

projects.title: Introducing JavaScript in the Web Browser
projects.description: Web Browsers use JavaScript as a programming language and allow you to extend the functionality of web pages. In this small project, I manipulate the HTML elements and the styling on the screen using Vanilla Javascript.
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Git and Github

projects.title: Reponsive web pages with ViteJS & Handlebars
projects.description: In this project, I was running handlebars with ViteJS, I created 2 responsive personal webpages using CSS frameworks: ie, Bootstrap and Materialize. it turns out that I prefer Bootstrap over Materialize. The webpages were populated by information stored in a JSON file
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Materialize, Git, Github, ViteJS, and Handlebars

projects.title: Unit testing with MochaJS
projects.description: Earlier in the CodeX program, we Wrote various function on a bootcamp. In this Small Project I was doing Unit Testing to validate the fucntions using MochaJS ans ChaiJS
projects.technologies: Html, JavaScript, Git, Github, MochaJS and ChaiJS

projects.title: DOM - Color mixer
projects.description: In this project, I display different colors depending on the CSS rgb() color combination. I use Javascript to manipulate the HTML and CSS of the webpage. Each Color displayed as a div shows it's curent value and the effect is visible on the div. The combination of the the 3 (RGB values) is displayed on the larger Div plus it's value
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript, Git, and Github

projects.title: JavaScript counter
projects.description: This project is a counter, it makes use of setInterval method to increment the counter variable after every 0.5s. Using onclick events, the counter increments, pauses, resets and decrements depending on the button clicked. This project is supposed to be an upgrade to the previous color-mixer project. The text on screen turns green when the count value is greater than 1, turns red when the count value is less than 0 and remains black when count is reseted to 0.
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript, Git and Github

projects.title: Anime gallery counter
projects.description: In this project, I developed a simple webpage while learning the basic of HTML, CSS and JavsScript. It shows some characters from my favourite Anime, which i can click a like button to like and dislike and the page is responsive.
projects.technologies: Html, CSS, JavaScript, Git, and Github
